flex.summary: Creates consistently spaced custom layouts that are responsive to other layouts and PatternFly components.

gallery.summary: Arranges content in a responsive grid of uniform rows and columns.

grid.summary: Arranges content on a fixed-size 12 column grid.

split.summary: Distributes multiple items horizontally, which adapt to viewport resizing.

stack.summary: Distributes multiple items vertically, which adapt to the available space of a container.
